message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase our top-of-the-line product. It's a game-changer in its industry and I truly believe it will bring immense value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to me is at least $1500000. I'm confident you'll see the value in this product and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
